players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Alice was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."
You: "I agree with Charlie. We should all keep a close eye on each other to ensure fair play and trust in this game."

Charlie: "I think it's important that we all share any information we may have about last night or anything suspicious we've noticed. Let's work together to solve the mystery and find out who among us is the mafioso."

You: "I'm glad we're all committed to keeping each other informed and working together to uncover the truth. I have no information to share at this time, but I will be paying close attention to any suspicious behavior or statements made by the others."
Diana: "Based on the information I have gathered during the investigation, I believe Bob is the mafioso. It's important that we act quickly to prevent any further harm or deceit in the game."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
